name: Touhou - The Neverending Winter Curse
description:
Kind of bullet hell made for the Touhou Fan Game Jam 10 themed "Winter Games".

One more time, Gensokyo is facing a terrible curse: the Winter seems never to end and evil snowballs are devasting the land.
Help Reimu to save the penguins and restore the Spring.
Gather, upgrade, set fires, and repair ice walls.
You can't fire but you can dodge and absorb snowballs.
Absorbing snowballs bring XP (that's the last icon in the right menu).
Same with killing them with wood fires.
You die if you run out of health of course, but also if all penguins die.
Hold until Marisa and Sakuya come to help you!
Good Luck!

Made with the awesome https://ctjs.rocks/

Good GFX: https://analogstudios.itch.io/

Bad GFX: me

SFX: https://www.bfxr.net/

Music: PixelBeats and https://cathran-music.itch.io/

Some notes:

- Arrows to move (WASD should work too) and spacebar to use the shield.

- Press M key to mute/unmute the music.

- Press P key to pause/unpause the game.

- It's probably unbalanced, it needs more tests and tweaking, but I ran out of time.

- The initial idea was to be able to choose between Reimu, Marisa, and Sakuya (each with her own special ability), but here again, time (and more balance work).
Still, if people like the game, it could be done in a post-compo version. : )

- Restart in-game is broken: please reload the game instead.
